info.author: Aryan Shekarlaban
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.name: hezar
info.summary: Hezar: The all-in-one AI library for Persian, supporting a wide variety of tasks and modalities!

classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.name: hezar
requires_dist: jiwer (>=3) ; extra == "nlp" or extra == "audio" or extra == "all"
info.summary: Hezar: The all-in-one AI library for Persian, supporting a wide variety of tasks and modalities!

Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.name: hezar

nltk>=3.8.0; extra == "nlp" or extra == "metrics" or extra == "all"
rouge_score; extra == "nlp" or extra == "metrics" or extra == "all"
info.summary: Hezar: The all-in-one AI library for Persian, supporting a wide variety of tasks and modalities!
